structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases

law.catch_line: Cross Examination Of Adverse Party; Corporationâ€™S Agent As Adverse Party
law.text: A party who calls the adverse party as a witness shall be allowed to cross-examine him. In case the adverse party is a corporation, an officer or agent thereof, so called as a witness, shall be deemed such an adverse party for the purposes of this section.
